title: Sabrina Carpenter Gifts Fans ‘Man’s Best Friend’ Bonus Track Version: ‘Thank You for Such a Beautiful Year’
caption: 🎁 Sabrina Carpenter surprises us with bonus track 'Man’s Best Friend'! Cheers to a beautiful year of music ahead! 🎶✨ #SabrinaCarpenter #NewMusic

title: Chance the Rapper and Jeremih Play ‘Secret Santa’ on Holiday EP
caption: 🎅🎶 Spread some holiday cheer with Chance the Rapper and Jeremih's festive EP! #SecretSantaSoundtrack #HolidayVibes 🎁

title: France recognises electronic music as Intangible Cultural Heritage
caption: 🎶 France celebrates electronic music's cultural significance! Let the beats unite us all! 🇫🇷🎧 #ElectronicMusicHeritage

title: Lady Gaga releases intimate ‘Harlequin’ concert film ‘One Night Only’ on YouTube
caption: 🌟 Step into Lady Gaga's world with her new 'Harlequin' concert film 'One Night Only' now on YouTube! 🎤✨ #LadyGaga #OneNightOnly

title: Céline Dion Spreads Holiday Cheer as the Grinch
caption: 🎄 Céline Dion is bringing festive vibes as the Grinch! Hit play for some Christmas magic! 🎅🎶 #CelineDion #HolidayCheer
